content.detailedDescription: Arising in the predawn hours for coffee on the patio, a woman soon noticed thata large circular portion of the stars overhead were blotted out. as her eyesadjusted to the dark, she notice several small red and white lights on thecentral portion of the black e objects underside. these periodically "jumped"to displace one another in position and color. after a half-hour, she summonedher husband, who witnessed the event for the next 70 minutes.The object slowly but continuously moved in perpendicular lines, offering theimpression of mapping. its overall movement was from south to north. as itmoved further away over time, they had the impression that the objects shapewas conical. no sound was associated with the object at any time. after viewingit for 100 minutes, they detected it was ascending vertically until it was lostin the black sky.The wife had the impression that the object was at high altitude and thereforeextremely large. the husband believed it was somewhat lower, though still atconsiderable altitude.
content.summary: Black conical object blots out part of sky in rura

content.detailedDescription: A then 19-year-old was riding his bicycle from minot to his home sometime in thesummer of 1978 on a warm still night. noticing what appeared to be a yardlightin a farm field, he stopped to observe and was captivated by the oddity for manyminutes. then the light began to rise from the ground and a ring ofapproximately ten yellow lights came on. the object seemed to have a dome abovethe ring of lights. two brilliant white "headlights" came on simultaneously. alllights shone steadily and without rotating as the object moved slowly (20 mph orless) at an altitude of about 1000 feet away from the subject, back toward himwith a banking maneuver to within a quarter mile, then away again, suddenly atgreat speed. when closest to the object, the witness hair stood on end, thoughquite possibly from exhilaration (no fear per se recalled). the object was lostfrom view as it sped nw in the direction of minot afb. sighting duration: 45minutes.
content.summary: Disc rose from a farm field near minot, nd, flew a

content.detailedDescription: A couple and their daughter, driving in suburban scottsdale, saw adiamong-shaped object with a concave, patterned underside and a pale green lightat each corner. the object approached from the nw and passed overhead as theyexited the auto to better observe. they attempted to follow it. the objectchanged direction multiple times (i.E., weaving pattern) before being lost fromview over nearby mountains. as it moved away, the object rotated so as to appearrectangular. the couple disagreed on the objects actual size but agreed on itsspeed (120-150 knots), physical description and path.
content.summary: Diamond-shaped object w/multiple green lights in a

content.detailedDescription: While driving along a peninsula surrounded by a lake, a woman observed twointense white lights motionless just over the treetops. these were soonrecognized as attached to a triangular object which moved slowly over the carand continued over the lake. no sound was detected over the witness auto andair conditioner. the objects underside was black to charcoal grey, with raisedrectangular panels covering the surface. a small red light was seen on onewingtip, a small green light on the other. the womans view over the 5-minuteduration was intermittently obscured by trees. the object was finally lostbeyond the treeline on the far side of the lake.
content.summary: Dark triangle at treetop level in mn.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work about 6:45 am, stopped at light near ford rd26 southfield (actually autobody dr) going east. noticed a very bright light tomy left above a distant telephone pole. decided to pull of into the visteonparking lot. rolled down drivers window, took out camcorder and began recordingthe object in the ne sky. traffic very noisy. object remained in view for about10 minutes. object slowly moved to my right (south) and downward. the sun hadjust risen at 6:45. went back to exact spot on oct 19 and video taped the samearea at about noon for a daylight reference and to determine distances to knownobjects and sizes. todd lemire of michigan mufon has a copy of the video with nosound on a cd.
content.summary: Noticed a bright point of light in the northeast s
Triangular sets of lights in the sky. three of them.

content.detailedDescription: I was lying down to sleep for the night. all lights were off and i was lookingout my windows. when i saw the object fly over my house kinda wobbling and thesame time. it was in the shape of a triangle, and three small lights and eachcorner and a red one in the center. and the body was black. i just knew at oncethat this was an alien ship, i had no doubt about it. i havent an idea why buti knew it was alien. so i staed laying on my bed and just watched it fly way tothe horizon. it didnt dash away or spike staight up. it just disappeared intothe horizon. now it wasnt dark out, it was just after sunset and the sky was adark blue. once i lost sight of it, i just fell asleep. and that was the firsttime in weeks that i hadnt slept so soundly. please call me, i have had othersightings.
content.summary: Ufo flew very low over my house

content.detailedDescription: Surrounding the period of scheduled 4th of july fireworks in the area, at least70 people in the west des moines vicinity contacted the ia state directorregarding a bright red object moving very slowly on a general w to e course atconsiderable height but below the 8,000-foot broken clouds. it made periodicdirectional turns to the nw, n, ne, e and s, twice ejecting a small red lightwhich descended quickly then made a right-angle turn laterally. individualssighted the main object from 10 minutes to over half an hour. some described arounded cylinder or oval shape with a vertical attitude.
content.summary: Prolonged sighting by many in w. des moines, ia.

content.detailedDescription: Three adults and two childen driving driving east near us-31 observed a brightstring of red and white lights hovering just over tree nursery buildings ahead.Moments later they stopped, departed the car, and saw a disc variously estimatedto be of "football field" and "747" proportions. it moved across their path froms to n. around the rim were numerous green and intensely bright white lights,with square windows interspersed. no sound was heard. the object glidedlaterally, dove close to the treetops, tilted toward them less than 100 feetaway, then "leaped" into the distance (n) and was gone. duration was 3-4minutes.Separately, in the vicinity and within moments of the first sighting, two womenat home were alerted by their barking dog and observed a string of white lightsand square windows just above the ground in the se, moving n at about 5 mph.They estimated the lights as "five railroad cars" in length. no sound was heard.One woman moved to an east window to continue watching until the object was outof sight. the other (elderly) woman complained of watery eyes during thesighting and blurred vision afterward. her eye doctor diagnosed her left eye ashaving been burned slightly.
content.summary: Disc hovers close to ground in northern mi.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on our balcony in ft. pierce which has a n/ne view of the ocean. it was just getting dark when we both saw a greenish blue ight that we thoughtwas a flare come up from low on the horizon to the north and headed towards theshore.  it prompted us to call the the pierce coast guard at south beach. thinking that it could be a signal from a boat in distress.  it appeared to bejust a few miles away.  difficult to say whether it was one or ten miles away. we reported to the coast guard that it appeared to make landfall somewhere alongthe beach area to our north.  the light was bright and seemed to be local, notmany miles away like a falling star.  a coast guard unit came out from ft.Pierce to the spot north of our building in the ocean where we thought we sawthe incident.  we called the next day to see what the results were.  they toldus that it could have been a meteor and that it was seen many miles away as faras north florida and also was reported by people in georgia.  but that when theyinvestigated they could find nothing.  this report was given to investigatorpuhalski by the witness hand written.
content.summary: Same green object seen by witnesses over 600 miles
On sunday oct 22.2000, i viewed three separate ufo.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i had came in from hunting,we were sitting on the couch,ourshow had just came on and i noticed a white light out the window,thenimmediately another behind it. i jumped up and ranout onto the deck, telling myson to come out. we stood on the deck and watched it, it was coming in on abouta 30 degree angle. it was moving moderately slow. my first reaction was that itwas crashing. there was 5 colored lights on it and it was shaped like a ... wellkind of like a submarine with big windows. the woods started cracking andsnapping and my son and i looked at each other,we couldnt believe it.I swore itcrashed.. we woke up my other son and ran out the front door, and we werelooking at the sky and we saw 4 or 5 jets in the sky and they were circling inthe sky above the house. there was a smoke trail right above my house.
content.summary: Last year during deer season i saw a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in our hot tub in the back of our house when wenoticed an aircraft flying rather slowly in a nw to se direction. at first, ithought it was a helicopter, but when i turned off the jacuzzi jets so i couldhear the aircraft, i heard only a very faint, distant sounding rumble or jetroar.  the aircraft disappeared and then reappeared heading from ne to sw, againrather slowly.  after watching it for about 4 or 5 minutes, we went back toenjoying our hot tub. (i was not under the influence of alcohol or drugs)p.S.  iwould only like to be contacted by e-mail!!!)  thanks for all of your efforts!  jc
content.summary: An unusually slow flying aircraft flew overhead tw

content.detailedDescription: It was a large(penny sized to the eye) glowing ball which seemed to move towardsme.  i tried to talk but just wasnt able to speak.  i felt a wierd sort oftinkling in my hands and feet.  as the object moved closer it seemed to get realdim and then it stop for at least a second or two then head to the eastincreasing speed.  then all of a suddend the object seemed to disappear.  ibelive highly in paranormal activity and highly belive that this was a ufo.
content.summary: Bright light in the northern sky.

content.detailedDescription: Daylight sighting: i was driving a truck heading n. on i-85 approaching mt. hopechurch rd. (exit 130).  ahead, approx. a mile or more and just above the treeline to the right of the interstate, a very bright blob of light suddenly got myattention.  (much larger than apparent size of planet venus at night.) it hadpositioned itself directly below and in line with the early morning sun.  sunapprox. 15 deg. above horizon.  object about 8 deg. background cirrus cloudsprovided good viewing conditions. but no dark sihouette to reveal shape ofcraft.  entire craft totally engulfed in what appeared to be its own reflectionof sunlight (same exact color). compensating for my own motion, i found objectwas in hover somewhere between 1,000-2,000 ft. altitude approx. 1 to 2 milesdistance at approx. azimuth of 110 degrees
content.summary: Sighting event - highly reflective metallic airbor

content.detailedDescription: Last night, saturday october 14, 2000, i was leaving a friends house a fewminutes past 10:00pm.  we were looking up at the sky and remarking howincredibly clear the sky was.  then i saw a bright, small, white light zoomoverhead at an incredible speed, with no sound.  at first i thought it wasprobably a shooting star that would burn out, but when it didnt burn out, ipointed it out to my friend.  it was heading southwest in the direction of thelos angeles international airport, and then all of a sudden it made what lookedlike a 90 degree turn to the southeast and after a few moments of flying in thatdirection, it just vanished.  i looked at my watch and it read 10:13 pm. shortly after that we saw a passenger jet fly overhead, but it had the typicaljet sounds and flashing lights and was not moving anywhere near as fast as whatmy friend and i saw.
content.summary: Fast, small, white light makes 90 deg. turn over l

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). i was standing on the fifth floor balcony of my apartment in chaiang maithailand in nortern thailand nerar the laos burma border.I observed three brightlight s moving acroos the sky one behind the other.They were large ,bright redand teardrop shaped. at first i thought they were helicopters but  the lightemmitted was too bright and constant --very unlike a plane or helicopter. i wasastonished! i stepped inside my door and brought out two cameras, i took severalshots  with each camera.7bi have not had the film developed this happened a few hours ago.5d i walked to my left to see if they would pass through the sky on the otherside of the balcony.I saw nothing . when i returned to my original vantage pointi saw two more objects coming from the same direction . i took several  morephotops,i then noticed that all five were framed in the sky.--stopped. i checkedmy watch and observed them for three minutes. i wrote a diagram on a notepad andnoted times. at the end of three minutes one object disappeared. gradually theyall disappeared. i now think they were not hovering in the sky but rather movingaway and as they got further away they became dimmer.My reaction was one of calmamazement, i thougt over and over this is some very wierd s----.
content.summary: At 6:36 pm on october 12 in chiang mai thailand, i

content.detailedDescription: Children playing outside, observed a bright light near the horizon in thedistance with an apparent diamond shape. airplanes or helicopters seemed to bearound it. after losing sight of the object for a few minutes, they observed itagain momentarily while returning home. total duration approximately fiveminutes.
content.summary: Children see bright moving light in michigan.

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over these instructions.)please limit your narrative to 2000 words (equivalent to 6 typed pages). 1. a 62 year old truck driver had just left boise, ok and was headed south easton us hwy 287.  he was near the town of kerrick, on the ok/tx line.2. he first noticed the objects out of the left corner of his windshield.3. since the objects were in the clouds and moving with the clouds, he thoughtthey were just clouds.4. when he first saw them, he slowed down  from about 60 mph to around 45 mph totry to get a better look.5. the witness states he observed 4 dark, blue/gray objects (dark spots in theclouds or oval shapeed)moving in a straight line and just in front of theobjects, was a larger object the same color.  all 5 objects stopped and hovered. the large object appeared below the clouds, with the 4 objects now spacedaround it, but they were still in the clouds.  the large ufo shot out a whitebeam at each object, one at a time, and the smaller ufos were drawn into thelarger one.  5. the ufo went straight up in the clouds and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Large ufo and 4 smaller ufos near kerrick, ok 28/1
